data.taskTitle: create new task ai analysis mentioned steelbridge - how?

data.approach: Investigating how AI task analysis gets project context. Found TaskCreationDrawer calls /api/tasks/suggest. Need to examine that endpoint to see what context it receives.

summary: Found root cause: AI task analysis receives ALL project descriptions, not just the selected project
AI makes word associations (proposal â†’ Steelbridge) based on project names in the context
Solution options: 1) Only send selected project context, or 2) Add stronger prompt guidance to use selected project
findings: TaskCreationDrawer fetches /api/projects?visible=true and sends ALL descriptions to /api/tasks/suggest
The AI prompt includes all project names: steelbridge appears in available projects list
AI incorrectly associated proposal/pricing keywords with Steelbridge instead of marduk

summary: Investigated task creation prompt and AI analysis mention of 'steelbridge'
Analyzed potential source of unexpected term in AI-generated content

suggestedTasks.title: Audit AI Prompt Generation for Unexpected Term Injection
suggestedTasks.description:
Conduct a comprehensive review of the AI prompt generation mechanism to understand how unrelated terms like 'steelbridge' are being introduced. Investigate potential issues in prompt engineering, training data, or context mapping that could lead to irrelevant term insertion.

Examine the prompt generation pipeline, log mechanisms, and review recent AI analysis outputs to identify patterns of unexpected term generation.
suggestedTasks.reason: Unexpected term detection during task creation AI analysis

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Prompt Validation and Filtering Mechanism
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a robust validation layer for AI-generated prompts and analysis to prevent inclusion of irrelevant or nonsensical terms. Create a filtering mechanism that checks for contextual relevance and removes or flags terms that do not align with the task context.

Implement unit tests to verify the effectiveness of the filtering mechanism across different prompt scenarios.
suggestedTasks.reason: Prevent unintended term injection in AI-generated content

patterns: Investigate AI prompt generation for unexpected term inclusion
Verify contextual relevance of AI-generated content
gotchas: Potential issues with AI prompt generation or training data
Unexpected term injection in task analysis

documentationNeeds: Update AI analysis documentation with findings on term generation
Document process for handling unexpected AI-generated content
